DOC.brief_summary: The study open-label , prospective , single-center , non-randomized feasibility study Bruxoff ( TM ) device identify EMG activity associate bruxism , assess impact TMJ NextGeneration ( TM ) device upon occurrence night-time bruxism event incidence migraine headache subject diagnose sleep bruxism .
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct one study center U.S . Subjects enrol trial period 8 week . The study consist screen phase last 2 week follow treatment period last 8 week . Subjects visit dental clinic twice screen period , five time treatment period .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects least 18 year age ; 2 . Subject diagnosis sleep bruxism ; 3 . Subject medically screen diagnosed physician headache and/or migraine ; 4 . Subject willing comply usage instruction Bruxoff device ; 5 . Is able read understand ICF voluntarily provide write informed consent . 6 . Subject able open mouth least 17 mm fit TMJ NextGenerationTM device ; 7 . Male Subjects willing clean shaven face night Bruxoff device use ; 8 . Subject agree use Bruxoff device keep cellular phone another room . 1 . Subjects physical behavioral disorder , , opinion Principal Investigator , may interfere use device compliance study protocol ; 2 . Subject sleep disorder bruxism ; 3 . Subjects direct trauma jaw ; 4 . Subjects prior TMJ ear surgery ; 5 . Subjects narrow ear canal impression ear canal , prolapse due anatomical shift failure ear canal wall structure , canal allow ear canal second turn identify ; 6 . Subjects visible congenital ear deformity observe targeted physical exam ; 7 . Subjects whose ear canal anatomy allow fit study device ; 8 . Subjects history ear pain unrelated TMJ ; 9 . Subjects history ear drainage past 6 month ; 10 . Subjects active ear drainage , swell , redness observe targeted physical exam ; 11 . Subject experience chronic pain ( include migraine pain ) associate sleep bruxism TMD six month ; 12 . Subject pacemaker .
